text.text:
one of the rare school whereby campus security will partake in voyeuristic pictures and videos of students. very weird. me and my friends got snapped in a public space and security was confrontation for no reason. wrote to the school and said they'll look into the security old man who did this because his conduct is inappropriate but i recommend avoiding this sch (there's plenty other better govt sch) because if the security could be this hostile and unsafe, i don't picture them to be the one safeguarding students. sorry but no.
there's a reason why all uni have some unsaid reputation; it didn't come from nowhere.

be smart and make your own decision.

text.text:
Big school campus within the city area.
The buildings are very modernised.
Linkages and underpasses in between the buildings.
Also shops and student owned cafe inside the campus.
Lots of benches for sitting. Seats with plugs are usually located inside the underpass.

text.text: Applied for Jan 25 masters in late Sept 2024, no follow ups from the admission office till late Dec 2024. Upon request for status update, then rushed to arrange for interview but I've already accepted NTU offer. Spent the time to get referral and $100 application fee, felt my time is wasted.

originalText.text: Applied for Jan 25 masters in late Sept 2024, no follow ups from the admission office till late Dec 2024. Upon request for status update, then rushed to arrange for interview but I've already accepted NTU offer. Spent the time to get referral and $100 application fee, felt my time is wasted.

text.text: They gave full scholarship to many international students, but did not give any scholarship to needy local students who are from a medium or low-income family. Many international students got a very good grade in their home country because their A level is much easier than Singapore A level.

Many international students got a very good grade in their home country because their A level is much easier than Singapore A level.

text.text: Besides being a school compound, the space is often used for large scale events too! Was there just last week for the Singapore Night Festival, super cool event!
